name: 傅子恒
objective: The course "Interactive Programming III" aims to provide students with comprehensive Unity C# programming skills and their application in ARPG (Action Role-Playing Game) development. The 18-week course covers a range of topics from basic to advanced, combined with practical project development to enable students to master and apply their knowledge.
